name: ITServiceManagementFacts
0:
”Alexa, open i. t. s. m. facts.”
”Alexa, start i. t. s. m. facts and tell me an itsm fact”
”Alexa, launch i. t. s. m. facts and give me an itsm fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. t. s. m. facts
des: This app queries from a list of IT Service Management Terminology. Simply ask Alexa to: "open ITSM Facts" to get a random fact. Expand your knowledge in IT Service Management with this Alexa Skill! Includes nearly 600 facts!
